name: Test Subject (Ace Savaid, Kana Nankoni)
description:
Welcome my helpful test subject! Thank you for your support.   Here before you are some simple, easy puzzles, complete them all and you get your prize! Don't worry, there are notes on the walls to help you if you get stuck.

You play as Niles, a boy trying to complete all the simple tasks to get to the end and get his prize.  Flip switches, interact with items, find the right combinations, do anything you can tomake the door unlock to continue to the next room.
